skills.label: Plan installation
items: Design the installation of sql server and its components (drives, service accounts, etc.)
Plan for capacity, including if/when to shrink, grow, autogrow, and monitor growth
Manage the technologies that influence sql architecture (for example, service broker, full text, scale out, etc.)
Design the storage for new databases (drives, filegroups, partitioning)
Configure a sql server standby database for reporting purposes
Windows-level security and service level security
Benchmark a server before using it in a production environment (sqlio, tests on sql instance)

skills.label: Install SQL Server and related services
items: Install sql server database engine and ssis (not ssrs and ssas)

skills.label: Implement a migration strategy
items: Migrate systems and data from other sources

skills.label: Configure additional SQL Server components
items: Set up and configure all sql server components (engine, as, rs and sharepoint integration) in a complex and highly secure environment

skills.label: Manage SQL Server Agent
items: Automate (setup, maintenance, monitoring) across multiple databases and multiple instances
Send to "manage sql server agent jobs"

skills.label: Manage and configure databases
items: Database configuration and standardization: autoclose, autoshrink, recovery models
Manage file space, including adding new filegroups and moving objects from one filegroup to another

skills.label: Configure SQL Server instances
items: Configure and standardize a database: autoclose, autoshrink, recovery models
Configure sql to use only certain cpus (affinity masks, etc.)
Configure many databases/instance, many instances/server, virtualization
Configure sql server engine: memory, filffactor, sp_configure, default options

skills.label: Implement a SQL Server clustered instance
items: Manage multiple instances on a cluster
Recover from a failed cluster node

skills.label: Manage SQL Server instances
items: Manage resource utilization by using resource governor

skills.label: Identify and resolve concurrency problems
items: Examine deadlocking issues using the sql server logs using trace flags
Monitor via dmv or other ms product
Diagnose blocking, live locking and deadlocking
Performance detection with built in dmvs
Locate and if necessary kill processes that are blocking or claiming all resources

skills.label: Collect and analyze troubleshooting data
items: Collect performance data by using system monitor
Collect trace data by using sql server profiler
Identify and troubleshoot data access problems
Identify potential problems before they cause service interruptions
Create alerts on critical server condition
Monitor data and server access by creating audit and other controls
Identify io vs. memory vs. cpu bottlenecks

skills.label: Audit SQL Server instances
items: Implement a security strategy for auditing and controlling the instance
Monitor elevated privileges as well as unsolicited attempts to connect

skills.label: Configure and maintain a back-up strategy
items: Manage different backup models, including point-in-time recovery
Protect customer data even if backup media is lost
Perform backup/restore based on proper strategies including backup redundancy
Implement and test a database implementation and a backup strategy (multiple files for user database and tempdb, spreading database files, backup/restore)
Back up a sql server environment

skills.label: Restore databases
items: Restore a database secured with tde
Recover data from a damaged db (several errors in dbcc checkdb)
Restore to a point in time

skills.label: Implement and maintain indexes
items: Inspect physical characteristics of indexes and perform index maintenance
Set up a maintenance strategy for indexes and statistics
Statistics (full, filter) force or fix queue
When to rebuild vs. reorg and index

skills.label: Manage logins and server roles
items: Secure the sql server using windows account / sql server accounts, server roles
Manage access to the server, sql server instance, and databases
Create and maintain user-defined server roles

skills.label: Manage users and database roles
items: Create access to server / database with least privilege
Manage security roles for users and administrators
